full_title: White Trash Circus by Mötley Crüe
title: White Trash Circus
lyrics:
3 ContributorsWhite Trash Circus Lyrics[Verse 1]
Well, I opened up the bottle and I fell out of bed
I couldn't find the floor until it hit me in the head
I did a little powder off the bathroom sink
It's been about a month and something's start to stink
Me and the band, we are starting to fight
Because if we got along it just wouldn't feel right

[Pre-Chorus]
We're the white trash circus, don't give a damn
We'll steal your girl whenever we can
We're the drunken gods of the living dead

[Chorus]
We're the voice, we're the voice
We're the voice in your head
We're the trash, we're the trash
We're the trash in your bed

[Verse 2]
I been living on the road about a year and half
If we go another mile, we're going to kick each other's ass
Someone's going to quit or someone's going to die
We don't give a shit because we're busy getting high
Another lawsuit, another arrest
We wouldn't change a thing because we love it to death
See Mötley Crüe LiveGet tickets as low as $100You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
We're the white trash circus, don't give a damn
We'll steal your girl whenever we can
We're the drunken gods of the living dead

[Chorus]
We're the voice, we're the voice
We're the voice in your head
We're the trash, we're the trash
We're the trash in your bed

[Verse 3]
We're the son's of devil, we're the blood on the stage
You can love us, you can hate us but we'll never go away

[Pre-Chorus]
We're the white trash circus, don't give a damn
We'll steal your girl whenever we can
We're the drunken gods of the living dead

[Chorus]
We're the voice, we're the voice
We're the voice in your head

[Pre-Chorus]
We're the white trash circus, don't give a damn
We'll steal your girl whenever we can
We're the drunken gods of the living dead
[Chorus]
We're the voice, we're the voice
We're the voice in your head
We're the trash, we're the trash
We're the trash in your bed

We're the voice, we're the voice
We're the voice in your head
We're the trash, we're the trash
We're the trash in your bedEmbed
